name: The Three Lockdowneers
description:
Think you can survive the lockdown for a week?

Controls:

AD - Move

W - Jump

P - Shoot

O - Switch Weapons

The Three Lockdowneers is an endless and addictive game where you are a medical hero who fights against a deadly virus that is rapidly spreading in the town.

The more days you survive, the harder it gets as you challenge more and stronger enemies who will try and invade your space.

Collect as many toilet papers you can to prepare for the next day!

Features:
● Endless gameplay.
● 4 soap dispensers with different stats to choose from, along with a special soap dispenser!
● 5 unique enemies to challenge.
● 3 different hazmat skins to customise your player!

Stay quarantined for upcoming features like new enemies, weapons and much more customisation options for your player and soap dispensers!
